name: Structure House Recovery
description: Faith-based addiction recovery facility offering comprehensive substance use disorder treatment services in London, Kentucky. Founded in June 2021 by CEO Bret P. Watkins, the program provides a safe, judgment-free environment focused on kindness, caring, compassion, and grace. Services include intensive outpatient programs (IOP), outpatient programs (OP), individual and group therapy, medication management, psychiatric assessments, drug screening, case management, crisis intervention, and telehealth services. The facility is DOC-approved and MAT-friendly, serving clients serious about recovery with a proven track record of helping thousands achieve and maintain sobriety.
source: Verified from official website, Google Maps, and multiple third-party directories
eligibility: Individuals struggling with drug or alcohol addiction who are serious about recovery
services: Intensive outpatient program (IOP), outpatient program (OP), individual and group therapy, medication management, psychiatric assessments, drug screening, case management, crisis intervention, telehealth services, DOC-approved programs
notes: Faith-based recovery program with 4 locations in London, KY. Founded June 2021. CEO: Bret P. Watkins. Program fee: $125 per week for OP. IOP is 16-week program with 3-hour group sessions 4 days per week. OP is 2-hour classes 2 days per week. 90% of peer support specialists are former clients. DOC-approved for court, drug court, probation, and parole requirements.
